channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Fans in Shohei Ohtani’s Japanese hometown pack in to watch Game 3 of the World Series
item.description: Hundreds of fans filed into a public viewing center in Shohei Ohtani’s hometown in northern Japan on Tuesday morning to cheer the country’s top celebrity in Game 3 of the World Series.

item.title: Democrats go after Jill Stein, Cornel West in digital ads aimed at young voters
item.description: Democrats are spending about $500,000 for a last-minute push to persuade voters in battleground states to reject third-party candidates Jill Stein and Cornel West.

item.title: Lassa fever suspected in death of Iowa resident who traveled to West Africa
item.description: Health officials are investigating the death of an Iowa resident as a suspected case of Lassa fever, a frightening viral disease rarely seen in America.
